message: I think it's fair to split the money 99% to me and 1% to you.  Let's get this over with quickly!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think a more equitable split is in order. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  This reflects my understanding of the time value of money in this scenario. Let's find a compromise.
Bob, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but 90/10 is my final offer.  If you reject this, you'll lose more with each round, and we'll both end up with nothing!

Alice, I'm serious about finding a fair solution. Your offers don't reflect the decreasing value of the money over time for me. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. This is my final offer.  Let's be reasonable and avoid losing everything.
